reuters.title: I.R.E. FINANCIAL CORP <IF> YEAR
reuters.body: Shr 94 cts vs 77 cts Net 2.1 mln vs 1.7 mln Revs 7.8 mln vs 8.8 mln NOTE:Per share data reflects elimination of 500,000 shares owned by 50 pct owned subsidiary and reflect one-for-three reverse stock split effective march 5, 1986. Reuter 
